<small>Aramaic form: [[H8625]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקַל‎</span> **verb** ==weigh== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be heavy***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***heaviness, weight***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***load***, Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תקל‎</span> ***weigh***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּקַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***(weigh), pay***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְלָא‎</span> ***shekel***, but also (Old Aramaic, Zinjirli) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שקל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שקלן‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>382</sup>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lift up***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ša‡@âlu***</u></abbr>, ***weigh***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ši‡lu***</u></abbr> (apparently) = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁקֶל‎</span>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hand up, weigh***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משקל‎</span> ***weight***; compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>202</sup>, also Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σίγλος</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">σίκλος</span>) [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>M ii. 357</sup> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Framdw. 118 f.</sup>; — on connection of meanings compare ***weigh*** transitive and intransitive = German ***wägen, wiegen***, also ***heave, heavy, heft*** (= ***weight***, obs. or colloq.)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.14.26|2Sam 14:26]]; [[Isa.40.12|Isa 40:12]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁקִל‎</span> [[Exod.22.16|Exod 22:16]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁקְלֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Job.31.6|Job 31:6]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקוֺל‎</span> [[Job.6.2|Job 6:2]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁקוֺל‎</span> [[Esth.4.7|Esth 4:7]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁקֵל‎</span> [[Isa.33.18|Isa 33:18]]; [[2Sam.18.12|2Sam 18:12]] read perhaps ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקֻל‎</span>, see infra, — 

**1.** ***weigh***, human subject, accusative of thing [[2Sam.14.26|2Sam 14:26]]; [[Isa.46.6|Isa 46:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of scale); figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Isa.40.12|Isa 40:12]] also (accusative of person) [[Job.31.6|Job 31:6]] (both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of scale); compare Infinitive absolute below **Niph\`al**; ***weigh*** precious metals intrusted to one, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Ezra.8.25|Ezra 8:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליָֿדָם‎</span> v[[Ezra.8.26|Ezra 8:26]], accusative of thing omitted v[[Ezra.8.29|Ezra 8:29]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> of superior). 

**2.** ***weigh out*** a price (i.e. pay): accusative of silver [[Exod.22.16|Exod 22:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.20.39|1Kgs 20:39]]; [[Zech.11.12|Zech 11:12]]; [[Jer.32.10|Jer 32:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of scale), [[Isa.55.2|Isa 55:2]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, ***in exchange for***); +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Jer.32.9|Jer 32:9]]; [[Gen.23.16|Gen 23:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכַּֿפַּי‎</span> [[2Sam.18.12|2Sam 18:12]] (read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקֻל‎</span>, so [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליְֿדֵי פ‎</span> [[Esth.3.9|Esth 3:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלגִּֿנְזֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> [[Esth.4.7|Esth 4:7]] **Niph\`al** ***be weighed:*** 

**1.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקַל‎</span>, subject of thing [[Ezra.8.33|Ezra 8:33]] (passive of Qal v[[Ezra.8.25|Ezra 8:25]]f.); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular figurative (+ Qal ***Infinitive absolute***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּ שָׁקוֺל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁקֵל כַּעְשִׂי‎</span> [[Job.6.2|Job 6:2]]. 

**2.** ***be weighted out***, as price, [[Job.28.15|Job 28:15]].
